definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: My head throbbed. There was blood all over the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我的脑袋悸跳着作痛，雪地上到处都是血。

sentences.english: Her eyes ached because she didn't sleep well last night.
sentences.chinese: 由于昨夜没睡好，她的眼睛隐隐作痛。

sentences.english: That piece of metal in her back hurts almost all the time.
sentences.chinese: 后背里的那条金属棒一直让她隐隐作痛。

sentences.english: I began to dull pain of the wound, but I endured.
sentences.chinese: 时，我的伤口就开始隐隐作痛，但我还是忍着。

sentences.english: My feet still ached from the morning orientation and the tour of the school.
sentences.chinese: 经过早上的迎新会和校园参观，脚也开始隐隐作痛。

sentences.english: Or a gentle touch, will dull pain.
sentences.chinese: 或者轻轻的一碰，就会隐隐作痛。

sentences.english: In fact, when a person, the heart is aching and tears ready for it.
sentences.chinese: 其实一个人的时候，心在隐隐作痛，泪在蠢蠢欲动。

sentences.english: My head just feels in pain.
The gibe smarted in his brain.
sentences.chinese: 人家的嘲笑令他脑子针扎似地作痛。

sentences.english: The aching hollowness in sleight of hand.
sentences.chinese: 还有我灵巧戏法背后阵阵作痛的空虚。

sentences.english: As the old street lamp was listening to their conversation, he felt his heart aching.
sentences.chinese: 旧街灯听到这番话，心里隐隐作痛。

sentences.english: And like before, he felt the lingering ache in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 跟以前一样，他还是会感觉到心里在隐隐地作痛。

sentences.english: What bothers Chinese steel industry years of this word old scar, will continue to dull pain.
sentences.chinese: 困扰中国钢铁业数年的这道旧伤疤，还将继续作痛。

sentences.english: I have a pain in my left side.
sentences.chinese: 我身体的左侧隐隐作痛。

sentences.english: If I hold it for an hour, I'll have an ache in my right arm.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要拿一个小时，可能你的右手臂会隐隐作痛。

sentences.english: Her eyes were very bright, and she felt a steady pain in her shoulder towards the top of the left shoulder-blade.
sentences.chinese: 并且觉得在左肩胛骨上方的肩膀时常作痛。

definition: to ache/to be sore/to feel painful
to throb with pain/throbbing pain/twang/pang/CL:陣|阵[zhen4]
sharp pain/cramp/griping pain/colic/angina, cf 心絞痛|心绞痛
chest and hypochondrium/upper part of the body
to sneak in/to infiltrate/to be piercingly painful/to be unbearable (of pain, itch etc)
